あーあー。マイクテス。マイクテス。\nワンツーワンツー。:
Aww. Mike, tess. Mike. Tess!
One, two, one, two.
みなさーん！ コンチワー！ 制圧ってるぅ～？ みんなご存知！\nみんな大好き！:
Everyone! Conchiwa! Are you under control? Everyone knows!
I love you all! I'm Amane, the host of the Conqueror's Committee!
えっ？ ご存知ない……？ じゃあ、今知ってくださいっす！\nこれで問題ナシ！！:
Huh? You don't know...? Then you should know right now!
Now there's no problem!! Mabudachi Mabu Mabu Family!!
あぁ、『スタンピード』か～。\nちなみに柊校舎だけじゃなくて、学園の全校舎に向け:
Oh, the Stampede.
By the way, it's not just flowing toward the Hiiragi building. It's flowing towards the entire school building.
アマネちゃんからのお知らせっすよ！ 先ほどスタンピード――\nメイズシフターの大:
I've got a message from Amane! A stampede earlier—
We've confirmed a large number of maise shifters! Just as large as last time!
そんなわけで……ドンドンパフパフ！ 嬉し恥ずかし！\n癒やし壊しのサークル対抗制:
That's why...dondondonpuff puff puff! I'm so happy and embarrassed!
It's time for the Healing and Destroying Circle Battle to begin!
って感じで、メイズシフター討伐を目的にしたイベントが開かれるの。\nあいつらも生:
That's how the event is going to be held for the purpose of subjugating the Maizsifter.
They're living creatures too, so there's a lot of them sometimes.
大量発生と聞くと危なそうなイメージだが、その様子だとある程度\n予測や管理ができ:
When you hear about mass outbreaks, it sounds dangerous, but from the looks of it, to a certain extent
It's like she's able to predict and manage things. It'll be an event.
ピコピコピーン！ ち・な・み・に！\nただの討伐イベントじゃありません！ サーク:
*squeeze* *squieze!*
This isn't just a subjugation event! It's against the Circle!
たくさんのサークルが参加して、その討伐数を競うんです！\nもちろん、報酬も出ます:
We're going to participate in a lot of clubs, and compete to see how many of them are subjugated!
Of course, you'll get paid, too!
できないですね～。相手は倒しても倒してもたくさん湧いてくるんで、\nひとりでの参:
I can't do that. No matter how many enemies I defeat, a lot of them will come out.
It's dangerous to participate alone.
報酬が出るからって無茶しちゃう子が出てしまうんですよ。\nそのときフォローや止め:
Just because there's a reward doesn't mean there'll be any reckless kids out there.
If I don't have friends to back me up and stop me...
まあ、相手の数を考えると、\nこっちも集団で参加するのが道理だよな。:
Well, considering the number of opponents,
It makes sense for us to join a group, too.
そんなわけで、サークルでの参加は絶・対・条・件です！: That's why you're not allowed to participate in the club!
おおー、%usernameusernameuserna%のＡＩちゃんって優秀だね: Oooh, %usernameusernameuserna%' AI is really good, isn't it?
ふふん！ まあ、ボクは優秀なＡＩですからね！\nこの程度の解説なんてお手の物です:
Heh heh! Well, I am an excellent AI, after all!
I'm good at explaining things like this!
――なのでサークル参加が必須ってワケっす！\nメイズ討伐数１位の栄誉と報酬を目指:
――That's why you have to participate in the club!
I'll do my best to get the highest honor and reward for subjugating Mayse!
まあ、さっきの説明、全部解説の子がもっと詳しくしてたけどね。: Well, the girl who explained everything earlier was more detailed.
あとでいっぱい慰めておくよ。それよりも、\nメイズシフターが大量発生しているなら:
I'll comfort you a lot later. More importantly,
If there's a large number of maise shifters, we can't just ignore them.
――それでは皆さん心の準備いいっすか！？\n最強のサークルはどこだ！？ 盛り上が:
――Well then, everyone, are you mentally prepared!?
Where's the strongest circle?! Let's get excited!!
笑いアリ！ 涙アリ？ ポロリもアルかな！？\nサークル対抗制圧戦……スタートっす:
Laughter ants! Tears ants? Porori ants too!?
It's time for the Circle Battle... to start!!
